alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 04 at 4:34AM AKST until January 04 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER CONTINUES FOR THE FAR NORTHERN PANHANDLE... Various reports of upwards of 6 to 8 inches snow for the Haines and Chilkat Peninsula area were received around 11 pm Wednesday with snow still falling moderately. Snow rates are starting to lighten this morning around the area as the front starts to move into Canada. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reports of 6 to 8 inches of snow were received around the Haines and Chilkat Peninsula area as of 11 pm Wednesday. Snow rates have started to lighten. Freezing rain may mix in for the town of Haines Thursday morning as winds switch to a southerly and bring some warmer air into the area.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
